ComicInfo.Title: Space Flu
ComicInfo.Summary: POWER! RESPECT! Based on ADVENTURE TIME creator Pendleton Ward's brand new animated series! Join Chris, Wallow, Beth and Danny, four 16-year-old heroes-for-hire, as they warp from galaxy to galaxy, saving alien races with the power of their…emotions. They're noble, righteous and totally bodacious! This new series of original comics based on the new series from ADVENTURE TIME creator Pen Ward is sure to be a smash! ADVENTURE TIME #1 went to an unprecedented 3rd printing…don't let your shop be caught short for this brand new sensation!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 07:48:30. [CVDB369114]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jon Boam, Malachi Ward, Tyson Hesse, Zack Sterling
ComicInfo.Characters: Beth Tezuka, Chris Kirkman, Danny Vasquez, Pixel, Plum, Wallow
